akn:section.akn:heading: Office of Nuclear Safety and Safeguards

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment; appointment of Director There is hereby established in the Commission an Office of Nuclear Material Safety and Safeguards under the direction of a Director of Nuclear Material Safety and Safeguards, who shall be appointed by the Commission, who may report directly to the Commission as provided in section 5849 of this title, and who shall serve at the pleasure of and be removable by the Commission.
(b) Functions of Director Subject to the provisions of this chapter, the Director of Nuclear Material Safety and Safeguards shall perform such functions as the Commission shall delegate including:

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Responsibility for safeguarding special nuclear materials; high-level radioactive wastes and nuclear facilities

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Responsibility for safeguarding special nuclear materials; high-level radioactive wastes and nuclear facilities Nothing in this section shall be construed to limit in any way the functions of the Administration relating to the safeguarding of special nuclear materials, high-level radioactive wastes and nuclear facilities resulting from all activities within the jurisdiction of the Administration pursuant to this chapter.
